Detailed Description

File filter filtering image files

Class ImageFileFilter is a predefined file filter functor which filters image files. These are actually jpeg, gif, png, tiff, wbmp, bmp, ems, svg, and svgz files. Optionally directories get filtered, too.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ImageFileFilter::ImageFileFilter (  BOOLEAN  filter_dirs = FALSE  ) 
 

Constructs an image file filter. If filter_dirs is TRUE then all directories get filtered, too.

Parameters:
filter_dirs Tells if directories shall be filtered.

Destroys an image file filter.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN ImageFileFilter::Complies (  const Path &  path  )  [virtual]
 

Tells if the file with path is an image file of type jpeg, gif, png, tiff, wbmp, bmp, ems, svg, or svgz or is a directory in case it shall filter directories, too.

Implements FileFilter.

Field Documentation

Tells if directories shall be filtered.
